plot: Life doesn't get easier even after you've made the difficult choices. Middle-aged Karol packs up to leave home, but how much of himself must he leave behind in order to move ahead with the rest of his life?
title: Packing Up
plot_es: Life doesn't get easier even after you've made the difficult choices. Middle-aged Karol packs up to leave home, but how much of himself must he leave behind in order to move ahead with the rest of his life?
plot_en: Life doesn't get easier even after you've made the difficult choices. Middle-aged Karol packs up to leave home, but how much of himself must he leave behind in order to move ahead with the rest of his life?
